PHRASE.LANG: Let the Sunshine in with warm rays of Sunshine Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you through out PS Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
Laisse entrer les rayons du soleil de Sunshine Peep! Comme ta Compagne Peep, elle te suivra partout et sera ta meilleure copine.[#Legal]
Lass warme Sonnenstrahlen herein mit Sunshine Peep! Als dein Freundschafts-Peep wird sie dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist deine beste Freundin.[#Legal]
Lascia entrare i caldi raggi del sole di Sunshine Peep! Come il tuo Peep di Compagnia , ti seguirá in casa e diventerá la tua migliore amica.[#Legal]
Deja que entre el Sol con los rayos de sol de Sunshine Peep! Como tu Companion Peep, este seguirá a tu casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
Sunshine Peep의 따뜻한 햇살을 느껴 보세요! 컴패니언 Peep으로 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다. [#Legal]
Let the Sunshine in with warm rays of Sunshine Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you through out PS Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
Sunshine Peep帶來溫暖的陽光！作為您的隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Sunshine Peep帶來溫暖的陽光！作為您的隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Let the Sunshine in with with warm rays of Sunshine Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you through out Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
